entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:43 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 01:21 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
